column4: Im a high school student that recently downloaded ubuntu 8.10 to try out the wireless network(I could not get it to work on 8.04). When I tried to connect, it asked me for the network name, how do I get this?
if the network is broadcasting its ESSID,   sudo iwlist wlan0 scan
ok, ill go give it a try, thanks
after using sude iwlist wlan0 scan, it came back with wlan0 Interface doesn't support scanning : network is down, but my modem says its is giving off a wirless signal
